English: An old root from an ancient tree stump. It feels both flexible and durable at the same time.
A light armor oddly woven together by ancient roots and bark.
A light armor oddly woven together by ancient roots and bark.
Your head fits perfectly inside this knot of roots and bark.
The ancient roots help you focus your bow skill.
It's been dead so long that it started living again.
